field.name: summary
field.value: Explicitly applied IErrorHandler is called twice for every operation

field.name: description
field.value:
when an {{IErrorHandler}} is registered with {{.Attribute("scope").Eq(WcfExtensionScope.Explicit)}} and then applied to a service, it is called twice for every failed operation.
This doesn't happen when it's applied implicitly.
Looks like when specified explicitly for a service, the error handler is applied twice, at two levels: - for service - for endpoint
hence the duplication
